email_chain.subject: Request for Quote and Documentation Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hello Nimo,

We are looking to ship 8,000MT of diesel fuel from Fujairah to Singapore. Can you please send me a quote and also confirm your documentation requirements?

Best regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Documentation Requirements
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email.

Is it term or CIF price? Please confirm. Can you also share the fuel density?

We are urgently looking to arrange marine fuel for our vessel and will revert with my finalised data at your earliest.

Thanks,
Nimo

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Documentation Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Nimo,

I would like to clarify that my quote covers the term price to discharge in Singapore. The fuel density is 0.843 SG.

Regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Documentation Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Nimo,

CIF Singapore is $386 USD and term is $360 USD. Does that suit your budget?

Can you please let me know which fuel qualities you require? Are you looking for VLSFO 0.5%S, or 0.1%S?

Regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Documentation Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Kate,

We will need the fuel to be available on or before 25th August to discharge at your earliest. Can you please confirm when you will be able to supply it?

If you are able to arrange this, we will be looking for 0.5%S VLSFO fuel. Please confirm the FOB Fujairah price.

Regards,
Nimo

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Documentation Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Nimo,

I can supply you a VLSFO cargo available on or around 23rd August. The price will be $350 USD FOB Fujairah, plus a $1.50 USD additional fee to cover the forward fixing of the MGO. This will be purchased on the spot market at the time of discharge.

Can you please confirm you are happy with this price and to proceed?

Regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Documentation Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Kate,

The price you quoted is acceptable. If we can proceed, can you please send me the documentation that I will need to prepare to load this cargo?

Regards,
Nimo

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote and Documentation Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Nimo,

We need the following documentation:
1) Bank Guarantee (BG) for the diesel payment in USD at Fujairah (Palladium recommended)
2) [Additional documentation requirements would be listed here]

Regards,
Kate
